text: The San Gabriel River is a river in Los Angeles and Orange counties in the state of California. It is about long. It begins in the San Gabriel Mountains and flows southwest into the Los Angeles Basin, then flows into the Pacific Ocean near Long Beach and Seal Beach. Like the Los Angeles River, it is heavily polluted and is lined with concrete in many places. ==Nearby rivers== ===North along coast=== *Los Angeles River ===South along coast=== *Santa Ana River Category:Rivers of Los Angeles County, California Category:Orange County, California
title: San Gabriel River
